title: ranga koLalanUdalAgi
sahitya:
ranga koLalanUdalAgi mangaLamayavAitu dhare jagangaLu caitanya maredu anga paravashavAduvu


caraNam 1    tIDida mAruta mandagati geida pADida alaru bala goncalu biDE pADalollavaLi kulagaLu pADida mAmara cigurOdeya 
hEDi koNDavu jANvakki giLI mAtADade kaLe kundiduvu kOgile OdaTa vairATa biTTu khaga mrga kATha nidrA vashavAduvu
    caraNam 2    taLadudaka ukkEri banduvu tuLuki cellADi nindaLE yamune mEle mElODi mEghALi dhARiTTuvu kallu karagi nIrAduvu 
naLina campaka nAga punnAga pATala shAvantige kunda bakuLavu mAlati jAji parimaLa kUDitu nIlAngananghrikeragidavu
    caraNam 3    muddu mOhanana manjuLa sangIta saddanAlaisi gOpAnganeyarella buddhi sUrADi Ananda vAridhiyalli biddu paravasharAdaru
siddha munijanaridda samAdhiyoLeddu kuNidaru eduredurAgi kaddugeya rasanOlaisi koNDaru geddaru bhava samudrava
    caraNam 4    keccalu bigidu toreyalu moleyu vatsagaLoDalAseyu toredeLahulla kaccirallalli ninduvu gOvgaLu pucchava negahi nINtisi 
acyutanAkrti nODalu surarige AscaryavAyitu nAvu kaNDevendu mecci mukundana lIlAvinOdake heccina kusumava suridaru
    caraNam 5    shrI manOhara gOpAla mUruti A madhukunja vanadi tribhangili hEmAmbaravuTTu gIrgandha kastUri nAma makuTada beLaginali 
dhAma vanamAle bahirbhUSita svAmi purandara viTTalarAyanu nAmakriya mEgharanjani pADe sAmavEda namO namO enne
